Changelog:
 ·v0.0.1 First public release
 ·v0.0.2 Added Interface and Endpoint resolution
 ·v0.0.3 Databases can now be downloaded.

Notes:
 ·To fully use this application, you need to download copies of the Vendor ID Database, the Company Name Database and the Company logo zip file.
To do that, Press Menu->Update DBs. Keep in mind it is about 2.5MB.
 ·The Vendor ID database is the one used by my "USB VEN/DEV Database" application. Updating in one application will also update the other
 ·The VID/PID database is created by parsing the following file: http://www.linux-usb.org/usb.ids
